templates.name: eui
templates.description: Create friendly interactive UI with eui extensions
templates.description_en: Create friendly interactive UI with eui extensions

scaleModes.name: showAll
scaleModes.description: Scale app content with original aspect ratio. The wider direction of the scaled app content fills the player window while the other direction may not be wide enough and leave some black bars. In this mode, stage size (Stage.stageWidth,Stage.stageHeight) stays the same as app content size passed externally upon initiation.
scaleModes.description_en: Scale app content with original aspect ratio. The wider direction of the scaled app content fills the player window while the other direction may not be wide enough and leave some black bars. In this mode, stage size (Stage.stageWidth,Stage.stageHeight) stays the same as app content size passed externally upon initiation.

scaleModes.name: noScale
scaleModes.description: Don't scale app content. Content size stay intact even when player window is changed. If player window is smaller than the content, crop may be applied. In this mode, stage size (Stage.stageWidth,Stage.stageHeight）stay the same as player window.
scaleModes.description_en: Don't scale app content. Content size stay intact even when player window is changed. If player window is smaller than the content, crop may be applied. In this mode, stage size (Stage.stageWidth,Stage.stageHeight）stay the same as player window.

scaleModes.name: noBorder
scaleModes.description: Scale app content with original aspect ratio. The narrower direction of scaled content fills player window while the other direction may overflow player window and be cropped. In this mode, stage size (Stage.stageWidth,Stage.stageHeight) stays the same as app content size passed externally upon initiation.
scaleModes.description_en: Scale app content with original aspect ratio. The narrower direction of scaled content fills player window while the other direction may overflow player window and be cropped. In this mode, stage size (Stage.stageWidth,Stage.stageHeight) stays the same as app content size passed externally upon initiation.

scaleModes.name: exactFit
scaleModes.description: Scale app content without keeping original aspect ratio and the scaled content fits well in the player window. In this mode, stage size (Stage.stageWidth,Stage.stageHeight) stays the same as app content size passed externally during initiation.
scaleModes.description_en: Scale app content without keeping original aspect ratio and the scaled content fits well in the player window. In this mode, stage size (Stage.stageWidth,Stage.stageHeight) stays the same as app content size passed externally during initiation.

scaleModes.name: fixedWidth
scaleModes.description: Scale app content with original aspect ratio and scaled content fills player window both horizontally and vertically，but only the content's original width will not change while its height may change. In this mode, stage width (Stage.stageWidth) stays the same as the app content width passed externally upon initiation. Stage height (Stage.stageHeight) is determined by current scale ratio and the height of player window.
scaleModes.description_en: Scale app content with original aspect ratio and scaled content fills player window both horizontally and vertically，but only the content's original width will not change while its height may change. In this mode, stage width (Stage.stageWidth) stays the same as the app content width passed externally upon initiation. Stage height (Stage.stageHeight) is determined by current scale ratio and the height of player window.

scaleModes.name: fixedHeight
scaleModes.description: Scale app content with original aspect ratio and scaled content fills player window both horizontally and vertically，but only the content's original height will not change while its width may change. In this mode, stage height (Stage.stageHeight) stays the same as the app content height passed externally upon initiation. Stage width (Stage.stageWidth) is determined by current scale ratio and the width of player window.
scaleModes.description_en: Scale app content with original aspect ratio and scaled content fills player window both horizontally and vertically，but only the content's original height will not change while its width may change. In this mode, stage height (Stage.stageHeight) stays the same as the app content height passed externally upon initiation. Stage width (Stage.stageWidth) is determined by current scale ratio and the width of player window.

scaleModes.name: fixedNarrow
scaleModes.description: Scale app content with original aspect ratio and scaled content fills player window both horizontally and vertically. The narrower direction of the content may not be wide enough and padded up. In this mode, stage height (Stage.stageHeight) and stage width (Stage.stageWidth) will be determined by current scale ratio and player window size。
scaleModes.description_en: Scale app content with original aspect ratio and scaled content fills player window both horizontally and vertically. The narrower direction of the content may not be wide enough and padded up. In this mode, stage height (Stage.stageHeight) and stage width (Stage.stageWidth) will be determined by current scale ratio and player window size。

scaleModes.name: fixedWide
scaleModes.description: Scale app content with original aspect ratio and scaled content fills player window both horizontally and vertically. The wider direction of app content may outgrow player window and be cropped. In this mode, stage height (Stage.stageHeight) and stage width (Stage.stageWidth) will be determined by current scale ratio and player window's width and height
scaleModes.description_en: Scale app content with original aspect ratio and scaled content fills player window both horizontally and vertically. The wider direction of app content may outgrow player window and be cropped. In this mode, stage height (Stage.stageHeight) and stage width (Stage.stageWidth) will be determined by current scale ratio and player window's width and height

orientationModes.name: auto
orientationModes.description: Don't force app to rotate. App rotates with device
orientationModes.description_en: Don't force app to rotate. App rotates with device

orientationModes.name: portrait
orientationModes.description: Force app to rotate to portrait mode. In this mode, when screen width is greater than screen height, app will be automatically rotated 90° counterclockwise.
orientationModes.description_en: Force app to rotate to portrait mode. In this mode, when screen width is greater than screen height, app will be automatically rotated 90° counterclockwise.

orientationModes.name: landscape
orientationModes.description: Force app to rotate to landscape mode. In this mode, when screen height is greater than screen width, the app will be automatically rotated 90° clockwise.
orientationModes.description_en: Force app to rotate to landscape mode. In this mode, when screen height is greater than screen width, the app will be automatically rotated 90° clockwise.

orientationModes.name: landscapeFlipped
orientationModes.description: Force app to rotate to landscape mode. In this mode, when screen height is greater than screen width, the app will be automatically rotated 90° counterclockwise.
orientationModes.description_en: Force app to rotate to landscape mode. In this mode, when screen height is greater than screen width, the app will be automatically rotated 90° counterclockwise.
